11.content:
Tapping your pencil against your desk, you watch the clock, waiting for it to finally hit 12. You had plans to meet some friends for lunch down the road. Finally, the bell rang. Grabbing your bag, you make your way to the door, beginning your walk to the other side of the school where your car is parked. When you finally make it and walk outside, a familiar face is waiting by your car.

"Jaime, what are you doing?" you ask your younger sister. She looks at you with sad eyes.

"Please, can I come with you? Nobody will know!" she says, opening your car door. Thinking for a moment, you suddenly get a bad feeling about bringing her with you.

"No, I don't want you to end up getting in trouble. I'll bring you some food back." You reply, shaking your head. She goes back to school without saying another word to you. She's upset now, but it's for the best.

You get in your car, and begin your drive, admittedly speeding more than you should be to make it there and back before your next class. As you drive, you hear your phone ringing. You pull it out of your pocket and look down to see who it is. The caller ID reads 'UNKNOWN'. You decline the call and turn your attention back to the road, where a man is standing not 20 feet in front of you. Trying to avoid hitting him, you swerve into the grass on the right, while slamming the breaks as hard as you can. Your head hits the steering wheel and you feel dizzy. Your sight is blurring and you feel like you're about to pass out. You can barely make out the man walking towards your car. He opens the door and gently touches your head. You hear him say something but can't quite make it out. Something about 'swap'... 'anyone'... 'but there's a catch'... When he's finished speaking, he vanishes as quickly as he appeared. You can't fight it anymore, and you pass out.

Next thing you know, you're waking up. Your head hurts. You're still in the car so it couldn't have been too long. You reach for your phone and press the home button. You've been out for an hour.

"Great, looks like I missed lunch and now I'm late for class," you say, rubbing your forehead. You get out of the car and see that there was no damage when you drove off the road. You turn your car back on and go get your food, taking your time and making sure to watch for random people on the road.

About an hour later, you're back at the school, eating your food, waiting for the next class to start. When you hear the bell ring, you walk back inside. As you move through the halls, you're reminded of the man saying something just before you passed out.

What power did he say you have?

info.brief_description: Trait swapping stories, but with a catch
info.description:
A collection of trait swapping stories, where each type of swap/morph has some sort of catch to it. Each type will be described on it's respective page.


Swap/Morph Types:
- Body Part Swap: Can only swap one part per day. Clock resets at midnight. This includes swapping back.
- Body Swap: You can swap bodies with anybody, but only by making eye contact with them.
- Clothes Swap: Swap body parts by wearing somebodies clothes. If you don't change back within 4 hours, the change becomes permanent.


Characters:
Eric/Alice Williams: Our main character. Eric is the male character choice, Alice is the female character.
Common Traits: 18 years old; Senior in high school; Brown hair; Blue eyes; Gets along with everybody;
Eric: Average build; Medium length hair; Doesn't really belong to any groups at school; Calm personality;
Alice: Long hair; 34C Breasts; Is on the volleyball team; Has a nice ass; Fun personality;

Jacob Williams: The MC's younger brother. He is 16 years old and Jaime's fraternal twin brother. He has short brown hair and dark brown eyes. He is really into sports and has a very athletic build.

Jaime Williams: The MC's younger sister. She is 16 years old and Jacob's fraternal twin brother. She has shoulder length hair that she dyes a different color every few weeks. She hates sports and gets along with Eric more than Jacob because of that. Her eyes are blue. She has 32D breasts, and an hourglass figure.

Tom Williams: The MC's father. He's 39 years old, and works a lot. He is a very caring father and has a great relationship with his wife and kids.

Jenn Williams: The MC's mother. She's 38 years old, and began working again when the twins entered high school. She is very kind and would do anything for her children.

Anne Hendley: A senior in high school. She has been friends with Eric since they were in middle school, when they used to hang out a lot. They stopped hanging out as often when Anne began doing extra curricular activities her Sophomore year, leaving her with less time for a social life. However, she decided to take a break from all of that for her senior year. She has 32D breasts, and a very nice body from doing a lot of yoga. She's always had a crush on Eric.

Hannah Hendley: Anne's older sister. She is 20 years old. She spends a great portion of her time at the gym, and has a killer body because of it. Her boob size is unknown thus far, however they are larger than Anne's. Her ass and legs are perfectly toned, without being too muscular. She left school and will not talk about her reasons with anyone, however it is suspected that she was incredibly homesick.

Rules:
1. No single sentence chapters.
- This does not include chapters where it's only to give more options, such as with the first chapter.
- Please shoot for 1000 characters minimum, but it does not have to be exact.
2. Keep the characters/story consistent. I will edit small mistakes such as wrong names or character details that have already been established, but if a chapter goes against the entire story up to that point, I'm probably going to remove it.
3. Pay attention to spelling and grammar. Again, nobody is perfect, mistakes will happen. I know my grammar is not perfect. However, if I cant understand your chapter, I will remove it. There are tools online that can check grammar for you so there's no reason not to have decent grammar.

Notes:
         If you have an idea for another story type let me know. I'm happy to add another type of swap. The reason I'm not making it free game is to avoid repeating story ideas that have been done in other interactive. Even if your idea is the same as a previous one (body swap, part swap, clothes swap, etc.) As long as it has a different catch, I'm happy to add it.

         If you notice a mistake in one of your chapters, or want to add to it, feel free to message me with the change and I'm happy to add/edit it for you.
